title: Movie Theater, High Speed Internet Access, BBQ and Picnic Areas
posting_body: ['Gloria Park Villas', '3625 S. Decatur Blvd., Las Vegas, NV, 89103', 'Need more information?', 'Copy this link:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 49', 'OR Text', '49', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our leasing team.', 'GLORIA PARK VILLAS APARTMENTS IN LAS VEGAS', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 715 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Gloria Park Villas brings you to the hub of a thriving community and exceptional living.', 'Our Las Vegas apartments are enhanced by endless local attractions and the ideal arrangement of personal, and community amenities.', 'We offer floor plans that are complete with stunning features, and highlights.', 'Our apartments in Las Vegas feature gourmet kitchens with granite countertops, a private patio, spacious walk-in closets, window coverings, and more.', 'Within our community, you can discover beautiful landscaping, swimming pools, a movie theatre, covered parking, extra storage, and more.', 'Our spectacular Las Vegas oasis is nestled near many local attractions, restaurants, grocery stores, and everything that you need to feel right at home.', 'Find yourself jumping into a lifestyle that is full of simplicity, and luxury.', 'Come home to Gloria Park Villas today.', 'Features', '- Energy Efficient Thermostat', '- Full-Sized Washer/Dryer', '- Fully Equipped Kitchen', '- Granite Counter tops', '- Water Saving Faucets', '- Vaulted Ceilings*', '- Ceiling Fans', '- Spacious Floor Plans', '- Air Conditioning', '- High Speed Internet Access', '- Fireplace*', '- Pet Friendly', '* Select Units Only', 'Community Amenities', '- Movie Theater', '- BBQ and Picnic Areas', '- Swimming Pools with Spa', '- Gated Community', '- On Site Maintenance Team', '- Private Garages', '- Courtyards', '- Club House', '- 24 Hour Fitness Center', '- Assigned Covered Parking', '- TV Lounge', 'Driving Directions', 'We are located between Spring Mountain Road and Twain Ave., on S. Decatur Blvd.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday-Sunday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats & Dogs only, maximum 2 pets per apartment.', 'Dog 35 lb.', 'weight limit fully grown.', 'Breed restrictions apply, non-aggressive breeds only.', '$300.00 Non-refundable pet fee plus $35.00 monthly pet rent for 1 pet.', '$400.00 Non-refundable pet fee plus $50.00 monthly pet rent 2 pets.', 'Income Requirements:', '3 times the amount of rent, total household gross income.', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'mPbq2T7k']
